body.p:
Columbia Kentucky
May 11th 1864
To His Excellency
Gov Thos E Bramlette
Frankfort Ky
Dear Sir

The undersigned Petitioners would respectfully solicit your Excellency to remit a fine of $20. rendered at the May term 1864 of the Adair Circuit Court against W. S. Turpin for Gambling under the circumstances we hope your Excellency will see proper to exercise clemency and indulgence.

Respect-fully
M. H. Owsley
Fon T Fox
T T Alexander
Timoleon Crawford
James T Page
Jas Garrett
Jno. P. Page
Wm C Russell
W C Turk
H K Turk
Wm Todd Jun
John
Young C. Hunt
B Hughes
Wm Stewart
Wm McGinnis

Adair Cir Ct
vs
W. S. Turpin
May 20th 1864
Gaming

Remit except fees & costs
Tho E Bramlette
